verbs.description: [V: rothy] the san francisco startup famous for its washable work flats just came out with slip - on sneakers rothy first won fanfare for their hyper - comfortable machine - washable work flats made from recycled materials now the company has released their first - ever sneaker two years later we tested them out on the streets of nyc and were as impressed by the sneakers as we were by the flats rothy san francisco bay area reporter new york city connie chen bay area san francisco mara leighton
